elixir.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a magical liquid that is supposed to cure people of illness, make them younger etc
elixir.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: the search for the elixir of life
elixir.translation[0].definitions[1].def: something that is supposed to solve problems as if by magic
elixir.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: The current new wave of technology should prove an economic elixir.
